member.name: CMSG_KEY_TRANS_RECIPIENT_INFO
member.summary: The CMSG_KEY_TRANS_RECIPIENT_INFO structure contains information used in key transport algorithms.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_TRANS_RECIPIENT_INFO.dwVersion
member.summary: Indicates the version of the structure. If RecipientId uses the ISSUER_SERIAL_NUMBER to identify the recipient, dwVersion is set to zero. If RecipientId uses KEYID, dwVersion is set to two.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_TRANS_RECIPIENT_INFO.RecipientId
member.summary: A that identifies the recipient. Currently, only ISSUER_SERIAL_NUMBER or KEYID choices in the CERT_ID are valid.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_TRANS_RECIPIENT_INFO.KeyEncryptionAlgorithm
member.summary: A that identifies the key-encryption algorithm and any associated parameters used to encrypt the content encryption key.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_TRANS_RECIPIENT_INFO.EncryptedKey
member.summary: A CRYPT_DATA_BLOB that contains the bytes of the encrypted session key.
